com.gmail.dengtao.joe.transport.session
Enum IdleStatus

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<IdleStatus>
      com.gmail.dengtao.joe.transport.session.IdleStatus
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<IdleStatus>
public enum IdleStatus
extends java.lang.Enum<IdleStatus>

Represents the type of idleness of Session. There are two types of idleness:

  • READ_IDLE - No data is coming from the remote peer.
  • WRITE_IDLE - Session is not writing any data.

Idle time settings are all disabled by default. You can enable them using Session.setIdleTime(IdleStatus,long).

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
DengTao
